test.name: SecretMMS.TC.015
test.description:
Validate Recipient passwords are allowed between 6 to 15 characters long and include only alphanumeric characters no space or special characters Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- Scenario # 1: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients. 3. Add some passwords to the above list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are between 6 to 15 characters long. 5. Verify that there are no special characters or spaces in the passwords defined.
Scenario # 2: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients. 3. Add some passwords to the above list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are less than 6 characters 5. Verify that there are no special characters or spaces in the passwords defined.
Scenario # 3: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients. 3. Add some passwords to the above list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are more than 15 characters 5. Verify that there are no special characters or spaces in the passwords defined.
Scenario # 4: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients. 3. Add some passwords to the above list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are between 6 to 15 characters long. 5. Verify that there are some special charcters like * and !
Scenario # 5: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Verify the list of recipients. 3. Add some passwords to the above list of recipients. 4. Verify that the passwords defined are between 6 to 15 characters long. 5. Verify that there are some spaces in the passwords ---------------------------------------------------------------
